trans-unit.source: Import audio
trans-unit.target: Import audio

trans-unit.source: Beginner Designer
trans-unit.target: Beginner Designer

trans-unit.source: You can import audio files to use as audio assets in your project. You can import file types including .wav, .mp3, .ogg, .aac, .aiff, .flac, .m4a, .wma, and .mpc.
trans-unit.target: You can import audio files to use as audio assets in your project. You can import file types including .wav, .mp3, .ogg, .aac, .aiff, .flac, .m4a, .wma, and .mpc.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop the audio file from Windows Explorer to the Asset View:
trans-unit.target: Drag and drop the audio file from Windows Explorer to the Asset View:

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop
trans-unit.target: Drag and drop

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, in the Asset View:
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, in the Asset View:

trans-unit.source: Click
trans-unit.target: Click

trans-unit.source: Click (Import audio directly from file) and select the audio file.
trans-unit.target: Click (Import audio directly from file) and select the audio file.

trans-unit.source: To give the audio asset some default properties, choose a preset. (You can always change the properties in the Property Grid later.)
trans-unit.target: To give the audio asset some default properties, choose a preset. (You can always change the properties in the Property Grid later.)

trans-unit.source: Choose Asset type
trans-unit.target: Choose Asset type

trans-unit.source: Sound effect: Recommended for smaller files that you want to play directly from memory.
trans-unit.target: Sound effect: Recommended for smaller files that you want to play directly from memory.

trans-unit.source: Spatialized sound: Process the audio asset as spatialized audio. Note that Stride processes audio files as mono (single-channel) audio. The source file is unaffected.
trans-unit.target: Spatialized sound: Process the audio asset as spatialized audio. Note that Stride processes audio files as mono (single-channel) audio. The source file is unaffected.

trans-unit.source: Music: Recommended for larger files that you want to stream from disk to save memory.
trans-unit.target: Music: Recommended for larger files that you want to stream from disk to save memory.

trans-unit.source: After you import an audio file, you can select it as an asset in the Asset View.
trans-unit.target: After you import an audio file, you can select it as an asset in the Asset View.

trans-unit.source: Import audio from a video file
trans-unit.target: Import audio from a video file

trans-unit.source: You can also import a video file and choose to import only the audio tracks from it.
trans-unit.target: You can also import a video file and choose to import only the audio tracks from it.

trans-unit.source: In the Asset View, click Add assett and select Media > Video.
trans-unit.target: In the Asset View, click Add assett and select Media > Video.

trans-unit.source: Add video asset
trans-unit.target: Add video asset

trans-unit.source: Browse to the video you want to import audio from and click Open.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the video you want to import audio from and click Open.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, drag the file from Explorer into the Asset View.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, drag the file from Explorer into the Asset View.

trans-unit.source: Clear Import video and click OK.
trans-unit.target: Clear Import video and click OK.

trans-unit.source: Import video
trans-unit.target: Import video

trans-unit.source: Stride adds the audio tracks from the video to the Asset View.
trans-unit.target: Stride adds the audio tracks from the video to the Asset View.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also
